item.content:encoded:
The Neve Restaurant

Exquisite Dinning

OPENING HOURS

Monday-Friday: 8 AM - 11 PM

Weekends: 12 PM - 2 AM

Neve is one of the most exquisite restaurants, located in the beautiful oldtown of Belgravia.

Reservations

Exquisite Cuisine

Special Offers

Morning special

Fried eggs, fried bacon, toast, fresh tomato salad, cup of coffee or tea

12

Lunch special

Chicken wings, portobello mushrooms, mozzarella, coffee/tea

19

Dinner special

Grilled Beaf steak, roasted potatos, mashrooms sause, vine

15

See the full menu

Special Occasions

  • Weddings
  • Anniversaries
  • Baby showers

Celebrate your special event in beautiful atmosphere of Royal Plate.
Exquisite & creative cousine, friendly atmosphere and highly professional staff will make your special day beautiful & enjoyable. You can select from couple of pre-made menus for every occasion that should please many different palates or work with us to create your own menu.

More details

item.title: neve
item.dc:creator: radu

item.title: Menu
item.dc:creator: radu
item.content:encoded:
Our Menu

Starters

Soups

Spinach Soup

Milk, eggs, spinach, garlic, onion, potato, chicken stock, lemon

12

Tomato Soup

Tomatos, onion, carrot, celery, tomato puree, sugar, vegetable soup

10

Mushroom Soup

Mushrooms, olive oil, garlic, onion, salt, black pepper, persley, cheese

15

salads

Cobb Salad

Chicken, pepper, olive oil, salt, avocado, tomato, cheese, butter

10

Waldorf Salad

Grapes, lemon, olive oil, salt, black pepper, walnuts, yoghurt, celery

16

Spring Quiche

Asparagus, spinach, onion, milk, cheese, black pepper

18

Main Dishes

Grilled Chicken

Skinless chicken breast, black pepper, red pepper, passata, ginger, garlic

23

BBQ Beef Ribs

Ribs, oil, caraway seeds, yoghurt, carrots, onions, cabbage

25

Fried Chicken

Chicken thighs, chicken drumsticks, potatoes, ayenne pepper

19

Sicilian Tuna

Tuna steak, rose vine, red chilli, lemon, fresh basil, fresh dill, garlic

22

Turkey Tonnato

Turkey breast, red chilli, oil, tuna, lemon, black pepper, red vinegar

18

Pork Chops

Flank skirt steak, onion, butter, olive oil, red wine vinegar

29

Deserts

Chocolate Cake

Dark melted chocolate, juicy orange, sugar, lemon juice, vanilla sticks

12

Jamaican Cake

Strawberry, golden syrup, brown sugar, cream cheese, cinnamon

10

Ile Flottante

Vanilla pod, golden caster sugar, orange, milk, double cream

11

Panna Cotta

Milk, powdered gelatin, whipping cream, honey, sugar, berries

10

Tiramisu Cake

Egg yolks, milk, mascarpone, coffee, brandy, cocoa, chocolate

12

Vanilla Cake

Tangerine, vanilla sticks, milk, brown sugar, double cream

21

Neve Restaurant

Facebook Twitter Instagram

Address

Brncui 105,
6511 Bucharest

Contact

012 317 14 23
reserve@neve.com

Opening hours

Monday

8 AM - 11 PM

Tuesday

8 AM - 11 PM

Wednesday

8 AM - 11 PM

Thursday

8 AM - 11 PM

Friday

8 AM - 11 PM

Saturday

12 PM - 2 AM

Sunday

12 PM - 2 AM

Visiting outside the opening hours can also be done, on request.

Contact us
